About the Channel

Thomas Eisl is a photographer, YouTuber, and author from Vienna, Austria, who developed ‚ÄúThe Newest Objectivity‚Äù - a philosophy where the photographer‚Äôs voice is articulated through precise, purpose-driven visual language. He‚Äôs an OM System Ambassador who creates highly detailed, comprehensive reviews and educational content with superb production quality and editing.

Content Style

  • Extremely thorough reviews with deep technical analysis
  • High production values with excellent cinematography
  • Philosophical approach to photography as an art form
  • Educational articles on macro, external monitors, and technique
  • Fashion and editorial photography perspective

Why We Recommend This Channel

Thomas brings a unique level of depth and passion for fine details from the perspective of a working photographer, not just a YouTuber. His reviews are comprehensive and his appreciation for what cameras can do comes from extensive experience with many systems. While his content is enthusiastic about OM System, the production quality, script, colors, and editing are all superb.

Best For

  • OM System users wanting comprehensive feature guides
  • Those interested in philosophical approaches to photography
  • Fashion and editorial photographers
  • Learning advanced camera features and customization
  • Understanding macro photography and technical concepts

Content Philosophy

Thomas developed ‚ÄúThe Newest Objectivity‚Äù approach: The camera is blind, but the photographer‚Äôs vision makes it see. The photograph is silent, but the story makes it roar. Photography is the promise of eternity, but it reveals the flow of time.
